


Load Package
```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```



Load Data
```{r}
content <- readRDS("~/Google Drive/OUCRU/Covid-19/MoH_scrape.rds")
```


Find which row contains patient id
```{r}
content_df <- content %>% 
  add_column(id = as.vector(NA)) %>% 
  mutate(id = stringr::str_extract_all(content,"BN[:digit:]+"))
```

Delete rows that don't contain patient id
```{r}
id_row <- which(content_df$id != "character(0)")
content_df <- content_df[id_row,]
```

```{r}
l <- list()
for (i in 1:nrow(content_df)) {
  d <- data.frame(c(content_df[i,"id"]))
  colnames(d) <- "id"
  d$content <- rep(content_df[i, "content"], nrow(d))
  l[[i]] <- d
}

df <- do.call(rbind, l)

```
